title: 8x8 Named a Leader in Gartner Magic Quadrant for Unified Communications as a Service, Worldwide For Fourth Consecutive Year
text:
8x8 Named a Leader in Gartner Magic Quadrant for Unified Communications as a Service, Worldwide For Fourth Consecutive Year [September 08, 2015] 8x8 Named a Leader in Gartner Magic Quadrant for Unified Communications as a Service, Worldwide For Fourth Consecutive Year Tweet 
8x8, Inc. (NASDAQ:EGHT), a leading provider of cloud-based unified communications and contact center solutions, today announced that Gartner ( News - Alert ), the world's leading information technology research and advisory firm, positioned the company in the Leaders' quadrant in the September 3, 2015 "Magic Quadrant for Unified Communications ( News - Alert ) as a Service (UCaaS) Worldwide" for the fourth consecutive year. 
"Vendors in the Leaders quadrant have been delivering complete UCaaS solutions for multiple years, have clients with more than 2,000 employees supported and have more than 300,000 total employees supported. These vendors have their accounts implementing a comprehensive and integrated UCaaS solution set that addresses the full range of market needs, along with the proven ability to service large accounts. These vendors have defined migration and evolution plans for their products in core UCaaS areas and are using their solution sets to acquire new clients, expand their geographical footprints, and innovate to new functional areas." 
"We are deeply honored to be recognized by Gartner as a UCaaS Leader for four consecutive years and consider this another major milestone for the company," said Vik Verma, 8x8 ( News - Alert ) CEO. "We believe 8x8's continued success in the mid-market and enterprise, combined with our increased global footprint and product innovations, helped secure ur longstanding top placement in the UCaaS Magic Quadrant. 8x8 has made significant inroads this past year, including innovative feature enhancements that address the primary concerns of CIOs, seamless and rapid platform scalability, guaranteed SLAs for optimal call quality, and completing deployments at large enterprise accounts in just a few weeks."

About 8x8, Inc.
